about_the_game:
RTS, but the recruited soldiers will act automatically:

Each soldier has different characteristics/attribute values/action methods. As the lord of the castle, the player chooses the appropriate soldiers and buildings, manages the economy/defense/attack, and destroys the opponent's castle only through your strategy rather than operation!

Choose the map you want to play: different terrain, map size, resource richness, distance between camps, etc. will bring different gaming experiences.

You can freely adjust the difficulty: simply suppress the enemy, fight evenly, or take on the most difficult challenge.

Play the campaign alone/two-player on-screen battle/LAN online battle, try to destroy castles everywhere in different modes, and win the castle war!
